name: clean_blog
description: A blog interface is a user-friendly, visually organized web layout that prioritizes readability and easy navigation to display regularly updated content. It typically features a clean design with a clear visual hierarchy, consistent branding, and mobile responsiveness.A blog interface is a user-friendly, visually organized web layout that prioritizes readability and easy navigation to display regularly updated content.
